mapper.select: select temId, temName, temPrice, temUserId, temStock from shopDB.Item
mapper.insert: insert into shopDB.item(temId, temName, temPrice, temUserId, temStock) values (#{temId},#{temName},#{temPrice},#{temUserId},#{temStock})
mapper.select: select temId, temName, temPrice, temUserId, temStock from shopDB.Item where temId = #{temId}
select temId, temName, temPrice, temUserId, temStock,temDate from shopdb.item order by temId desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}

select temId, temName, temPrice, temUserId, temStock,temDate from shopdb.item
where temName like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
where temUserId like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
where temName like concat('%',#{keyword},'%') or temUserId like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
where temPrice like concat('%',#{keyword},'%')
order by bno desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}
